name: First
creators: CLARIN-D Centre at the University of Tuebingen, Germany
authentication: Requires a CLARIN Service Provider Federation account, provided by many universities and institutions.
description: WebLicht Easy Chain for Lemmatization (English). The pipeline makes use of WebLicht's TCF converter, the IMS tokenizer, and the IMS TreeTagger. WebLicht's Tundra can be used to visualize the result.
